data.title: Martina climate: Average Temperature by month, Martina water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Martina

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Martina

>>average temperature by month Martina

>>Weather Martina

>>Water temperature Martina

The climate here is mild, and generally warm and temperate. The precipitation levels in Martina are noteworthy, as there is rainfall even during the most arid month. The climate here is classified as Cfa by the Köppen-Geiger. The average temperature in Martina is 13.2 °C | 55.7 °F. The annual rainfall is 1994 mm | 78.5 inch.

The specified area is located in the northern hemisphere of our planet. The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The season is characterized by a sequence of months, namely: June, July, August, September. The most favored period for a visit is during the months of July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Martina

Precipitation is the lowest in July, with an average of 98 mm | 3.9 inch. The month of November experiences the highest amount of precipitation, with an average value of 283 mm | 11.1 inch.

average temperature by month Martina

At an average temperature of 22.8 °C | 73.1 °F, July is the hottest month of the year. The month of January is characterized by the lowest temperatures, which have an average reading of 4.1 °C | 39.4 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Martina

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

Between the driest and wettest months, the difference in precipitation is 185 mm | 7 inch. The fluctuation of temperatures over the course of a year is referred to as temperature variation.

It has been observed that November exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 79.13. On the other hand, July experiences the lowest relative humidity at an approximate rate of 66.43. According to the data, November is observed as the month with maximum rainy days (14.77) while August has recorded minimum rainfall during its tenure (9.47).

Martina weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Martina

The closest Airports of Martina are: Rijeka Airport (RJK) 27.02km,Pula Airport (PUY) 40.70km,Lošinj Airport (LSZ) 70.33km

You can reach Martina from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (RYG), Stockholm (ARN), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Manchester (MAN), Dublin (DUB), Zagreb (ZAG), Dubrovnik (DBV), Brussels (CRL), Stuttgart (STR), Hahn (HHN), Zadar (ZAD)
